When we started school this past September, no one could have imagined that the last few months before summer would be any different. Instead, our classrooms, hallways, cafeterias, playgrounds and athletic fields found themselves empty.

As we close out the school year today, June 11th, one thing is still certain. We have spent this time "Learning from Each Other" - from our teachers who flipped their instruction and classrooms to a virtual platform, to our parents who helped educate at home, to our administrators who continually found ways to support both their students and staff, to our students, especially our students, who worked hard to adapt, learn and grow during this unconventional time.

To all of our wonderful students, staff and parents - congratulations on a school year to remember. 2019-2020 is officially in the books! On to the next! #LearningFromEachOther #ClawsonPride ❤️
